lines.text: I don't believe in God.
Whether you believe in Him or not He's still there.
Thorold, Godspeed.
I told you I don't believe in God.
It's OK. He believes in you.
[Willie is smoking a cigarette]
Do you really need those things?
Hey, sis, listen - any wimp can quit smoking, OK? It takes a real man to deal with lung cancer.
Um, we've got some leftover salad if you're hungry.
Salad? You gotta be kidding me. Don't you have some steaks lying around here someplace?
Well, I'm vegetarian.
Yeah, well, if God didn't want us to eat animals he shouldn't have made them out of meat.
Oh, I'm not vegetarian 'cause I love animals. I'm vegetarian 'cause I hate plants.
Yeah, well, I didn't work my way to the top of the food chain to sit around chewin' on a cucumber.
Oh, well, that explains a lot. Vegetables ARE brain food.
Ooh. She's not only gorgeous, but she's rude and sarcastic too.
Helen Hannah, the woman who denounced the messiah on national television, the world's most wanted fugitive, and my very dear stepsister, meet Thorold Stone, the crazed lunatic who killed me.
Hi.
Going to church doesn't make you a Christian anymore than going into the petshop makes you a cat.

[to Thorold]
Would you tell Maggie that she should kill anyone who stands in her way of making her dreams come true? That's the lie Macalusso is spreading to the world, and it's the same lie that the serpent told Eve in the Garden of Eden.
My parents used to drag me to church every Sunday, had me pray for eyesight.

[to God]
You didn't make a believer out of me when my mom died of cancer when I was a kid, and You're sure as hell not going to make a believer out of me now.
Leave it to the professionals.
Professionals built the Titanic, amateurs built the Ark.
He says you only need faith the size of a grain of mustard seed, He'll take care of the rest.
It's time to decide what you believe in, Thorold Stone.
Who are you?
What are you?
I am a servant of the messiah. I'm here to help him rid the world of anyone and everyone who stands in his way and now, gentlemen, that includes you!
